findings.description: Module-level cache (challengeCache) grows unbounded over time. In practice this is fine since dates are limited and the app restarts frequently, but for long-running sessions viewing many calendar dates it could accumulate entries.
findings.suggestion: Consider LRU cache or limiting to recent 30 days if memory becomes a concern in edge cases.

findings.description: SMART_RANDOMNESS_START_DATE is hardcoded. If the feature needs to be adjusted or rolled back, this requires a code change.
findings.suggestion: This is acceptable for the current use case. The date is a deployment decision point that shouldn't change.

findings.description: haveSameShapes creates two Sets but since we're comparing exactly 2 elements each, a simpler comparison could work.
findings.suggestion: Current implementation is correct and readable. Set-based approach handles future expansion to more shapes cleanly.
